article_title: How Investment Managers (And Maybe You) Would Benefit From Trump's Tax Plan

article_metadata.author: Business in the Beltway

og.description: Republican presidential candidate, businessman Donald Trump speaks during a campaign stop, Wednesday, Sept. 30, 2015, in Keene, N.H. (AP Photo/Steven Senne) Donald Trump says he’d eliminate the tax break on carried interest. What he doesn’t say is he’d give the investment managers who now benefit from that scheme an even bigger [...]
